code: import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';import translationEN from'./locales/en/translation.json';import translationIT from'./locales/it/translation.json';i18n.use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({resources:{en:{translation:translationEN},it:{translation:translationIT}},fallbackLng:'it',interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
